QuestData.Title: A Boaring Time for Grulloc
QuestData.Description: $n, I have a pet boar named Huffer. He wants to help you to have some fun with one of the nearby sons of Gruul.$B$BGrulloc inhabits a place known as the Cursed Hollow. When you get there, let Huffer loose. The gronn will have a fine time chasing him around, and you will retrieve the bag that he guards and deliver it to Baron Sablemane.$B$BTo get to the Cursed Hollow, head down the northern ramp and east through Dragons' End. The hollow is on the eastern edge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Back so soon? Have you come to deliver that which Rexxar owes me?
QuestData.RewardText: <Baron Sablemane peers inside the gronn's sack and seems satisfied.>$B$BVery well, you have upheld your end of the bargain. With that price paid, I will give Rexxar what he seeks.
